properties.name: security.keys.location
properties.description: The filename of server's private key.

properties.name: security.keys.public
properties.description: The file name of server's public key.

properties.name: security.oauth.tokens.expiration.user.id
properties.description: Expiration time in minutes for id tokens.

properties.name: security.oauth.tokens.expiration.user.access
properties.description: Expiration time in minutes for service access tokens.

properties.name: security.oauth.tokens.expiration.service.access
properties.description: Expiration time of service access tokens in minutes.

properties.name: security.remember-me.hash-type
properties.description: Hash type to use for remember me tokens.

properties.name: security.remember-me.cookie.domain
properties.description: The domain to set remember me cookie's in.

properties.name: security.remember-me.cookie.max-age
properties.description: The cookie's max age in hours.

properties.name: security.preferEllipticKeys
properties.description: Whether to prefer elliptic keys during generation.

properties.name: security.useSeparateUserKeys
properties.description: Whether to use separate keys for each user.

properties.name: security.encryptPrivateKeys
properties.description: Whether to encrypt generated private keys.
